Walk to finish route one month after Marathon blasts

After the Boston Marathon bombings changed their lives forever, family and friends of the Norden brothers gathered today in Hopkinton to walk the 26.2-mile route to Boston that so many were unable to finish one month ago today. (12:30 p.m.)

MWRA chief: No problems at Quabbin after trespass incident

The MWRA says there's no evidence of contamination at the reservoir following a trespassing incident. Discuss (10:42 a.m.)

Is Senate budget a setback for Patrick?

State Senate leaders unveiled a $33.92 billion annual budget that falls short of Gov. Patrick’s plan to provide universal access to childcare and expand the transit network. (11:15 a.m.)

Rescued dolphins found dead in Yarmouth

The two dolphins were released into open water in Dennis on Monday but were found dead in Yarmouth yesterday. (12:41 p.m.)
